mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name as "createBy.name", suu.name as "updateBy.name", boh.order_num as "orderHeader.orderNum", boh.order_type as "orderHeader.orderType", so.id as "office.id", ( CASE WHEN boh.order_num like 'CO%' THEN cosu.name ELSE so.name END )AS "office.name"

left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id left join sys_user suu on a.update_id=suu.id left join biz_order_header boh on boh.id=a.order_id LEFT JOIN sys_office so on so.id=boh.cust_id LEFT JOIN sys_user cosu on cosu.id=boh.cust_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_status( id, order_id, biz_status, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{bizStatus}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_order_status SET order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, biz_status = #{bizStatus}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_status( id, order_id, biz_status, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time, order_type) SELECT NULL, brh.id, brh.biz_status, brh.status, brh.create_id, brh.create_time, brh.u_version, brh.update_id, brh.update_time, 1 FROM biz_request_header brh WHERE brh.id = #{id}
